text: (nabiye! ma pævasuveya yayi) oba mese pavasanu: mage vahaluni! (obagen) kavurun ho simava ikmava tamanta tamanma haniyak kara gatta vuvada, allahge varaprasadayan gæna oba visvasaya binda nodæmiya yutuya. (oba papayangen æt vi sit tævul vi samava illa sitiyahot) niyata vasayenma allah (obage) papayan siyallata samava denneya. mandayat niyata vasayenma ohu itamat ksama karanneku ha karunavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
